Okay, stop the cheap talk. At least, we didn't go on war against a 
country, hiding it as anti-terrorism action, because we had two towers 
blown up, suckaz (THIS IS ONLY INTENDED AS A JOKE AND BECAUSE YOU 
AMERICANS HAVE TO BRAG ABOUT EVERYTHING. KEEP YOUR NATIONAL HOLIDAY TO 
YOU PLEASE.)
